DOC.brief_summary: This study seek assess role GlideScope Ranger video laryngoscope facilitate successful neonatal/pediatric intubation pediatric critical care transport team . The central hypothesis study GlideScope Ranger video laryngoscope reduce rate fail intubation attempt pediatric critical care transport team . The aim project design specifically : ( 1 ) Establish competency GlideScope Ranger video laryngoscopy-assisted intubation pediatric neonatal patient ; ( 2 ) Compare intubation success rate intubation use GlideScope Ranger video laryngoscopy use conventional , direct laryngoscopy pediatric neonatal critical care transport team .
DOC.brief_title: The Use GlideScope Ranger Pediatric Critical Care Transport
DOC.criteria: age < 18 year Presence respiratory failure require tracheal intubation Critical Care Transport Team either refer institution transport receive institution Ability parent legal guardian provide write informed consent Patients 18+ year age Patient function tracheostomy Patient require orotracheal intubation
